Pre-Game Insights: Houston will try to keep its three-game road win streak alive when the Rockets take on Washington.
The Wizards have gone 5-14 at home.
The Rockets are 10-6 on the road.
The Wizards score 108.9 points per game, 2.2 more points than the 106.7 the Rockets allow.
The Rockets average 11.8 made 3-pointers per game, 2.7 fewer made shots on average than the 14.5 per game the Wizards allow.
